attributes.action: introduce performance related pay  and  performance development evaluations for all MP's
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To introduce performance related pay for mps via a yearly PDE review, with half year interim reviews where they will have to demonstrate and prove what they have achieved and done in relation to their responsibilities as an MP to there electors. Unsatisfactory performance to be marked and wages reduced in consequence..good performance marked likewise.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
